about_the_game:
You play as Agent Fields, a spy designated to retrieve an artifact from a secret underground facility. - filled with anomalous entities that want you dead.
Make sure you listen to your superior officers when dealing with these anomalies.



In the event of a breach, Special Forces are to be sent to the site as soon as possible. All subjects apart from site faculty are to be terminated.
That concludes this meeting. Please note down all important info.

License:
This game is derived from the SCP Wiki and SCP Foundation licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0. The SCPs in this game are original creations, but available under Creative Commons BY-SA 3.0. This game is derived from SCP: Containment Breach (2012), by Undertow Games which also falls under the CC-BY-SA 3.0 license.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild Violence and Animated Blood, Cursing and Strong Language

detailed_description:
You play as Agent Fields, a spy designated to retrieve an artifact from a secret underground facility. - filled with anomalous entities that want you dead.
Make sure you listen to your superior officers when dealing with these anomalies.



In the event of a breach, Special Forces are to be sent to the site as soon as possible. All subjects apart from site faculty are to be terminated.
That concludes this meeting. Please note down all important info.

License:
This game is derived from the SCP Wiki and SCP Foundation licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0. The SCPs in this game are original creations, but available under Creative Commons BY-SA 3.0. This game is derived from SCP: Containment Breach (2012), by Undertow Games which also falls under the CC-BY-SA 3.0 license.
legal_notice: This game is derived from the SCP Wiki and SCP Foundation licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0. The SCPs in this game are original creations, but available under Creative Commons BY-SA 3.0. Some of the assets used are also under CC lincense. Authors have been credited.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any/None Specified
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated VRAM
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any/None Specified
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any/None Specified
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any/None Specified
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

name: SCP: Ground Zero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

short_description: Infiltrate a secret facility to recover an anomalous object.
